channel.title: R package on Frederick Boehm's Website
channel.description: Recent content in R package on Frederick Boehm's Website

item.title: Binder and Reproducibility
item.description: Karl Broman recently discussed the Binder project on his blog, so I thought that I would try to use it for my new R package qtl2pleio, which I have shared on Github.

item.title: R package site incorporation into my personal website
item.description: Overview I’ve been developing the R package qtl2pleio. It’s now at a stage where others can use it. I recently found the R package pkgdown, which allows developers to build, in an automated fashion, websites for their packages.
